name: IKFixes
author: NotAKidoS
description:
A few small fixes and configuration options to IK. Major ones are listed below:

**FBT** - Fixes knee tracking, running animation direction, and animation bleeding into IK while calibrating/running. (no more chest tracker wiggle)

**Halfbody** - Fixes footsteps while on a MovementParent, uses root angle offset to prevent feet from only pointing in head direction, and uses an IKPose to fix feet pointing upward.
changelog:
- Added fix for animations affecting root to bleed into IK.
- Use an IKPose after HalfbodyIK Initialization.
- Fixed patch to leg solver that prevented lower leg rotation while using knee trackers.
- Adjusted elbow target offsets for a balance between accuracy and stability. Makes StandableFBE-tracked elbows feel much better to use.
- Added option to disable AssignRemainingTrackers feature.
- Exposed a couple VRIK solver settings for more fine-tuning.
